name: Time Tracking Template
description: Effortlessly track your work hours, earnings, and projects!Introducing a Notion template for time tracking, designed to help you take control of your work hours, earnings, and projects like never before! With this template, you'll easily track the time spent on each task, calculate your earnings based on your hourly rate, and manage multiple projects with ease.Key Features:Start and End Session Buttons: Easily track the time spent on each activity by simply clicking the start and end buttons. Ne
features: Start and End Session Buttons:Easily track the time spent on each activity by simply clicking the start and end buttons. Never miss a minute of your valuable work time!; Hourly Rate & Earnings Tracking: Enter your hourly rate and let the template automatically calculate your earnings for each session. Keep track of your income with ease.; Project Tracking:Manage projects that require multiple timed sessions. Start and end each session with a click of a button, and monitor your progress throughout the project.; Project Overview:Get an overview view of your total hours and earnings for each project, helping you stay on top of your income and productivity.

rawData.description: Effortlessly track your work hours, earnings, and projects!Introducing a Notion template for time tracking, designed to help you take control of your work hours, earnings, and projects like never before! With this template, you'll easily track the time spent on each task, calculate your earnings based on your hourly rate, and manage multiple projects with ease.Key Features:Start and End Session Buttons: Easily track the time spent on each activity by simply clicking the start and end buttons. Never miss a minute of your valuable work time!Hourly Rate & Earnings Tracking: Enter your hourly rate and let the template automatically calculate your earnings for each session. Keep track of your income with ease.Project Tracking: Manage projects that require multiple timed sessions. Start and end each session with a click of a button, and monitor your progress throughout the project.Project Overview: Get an overview view of your total hours and earnings for each project, helping you stay on top of your income and productivity.This Notion Time Tracking Template is perfect for freelancers, entrepreneurs, and anyone looking to optimize their work hours and earnings.Click the "I want this!" button and start tracking your time and income like a pro!
features: Start and End Session Buttons: Easily track the time spent on each activity by simply clicking the start and end buttons. Never miss a minute of your valuable work time!
Hourly Rate & Earnings Tracking: Enter your hourly rate and let the template automatically calculate your earnings for each session. Keep track of your income with ease.
Project Tracking: Manage projects that require multiple timed sessions. Start and end each session with a click of a button, and monitor your progress throughout the project.
Project Overview: Get an overview view of your total hours and earnings for each project, helping you stay on top of your income and productivity.

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive Notion workspace designed to help professionals monitor work hours, calculate earnings, and manage multiple projects efficiently. Built for freelancers, consultants, and independent workers who need precise time tracking with automatic income calculations based on hourly rates.

features: Income summaries by project and time period
Total hours and revenue reporting per project

problemsSolved: Difficulty accurately tracking billable hours across multiple projects
Manual calculation errors when computing earnings from time worked
Lack of organized system to monitor project profitability and progress
Lost revenue from untracked or forgotten work sessions
solutionsBenefits: Eliminates time tracking errors with automated session recording
Provides instant visibility into earnings and project profitability
Streamlines invoicing with accurate time and payment data
Increases productivity awareness through detailed work pattern insights
idealFor: Freelancers billing clients by the hour
Small business owners monitoring work efficiency
notRecommendedFor: Teams needing collaborative time tracking (individual-focused design)
Businesses requiring advanced reporting integrations (basic analytics only)
whatsIncluded: Project management database with earnings formulas
Session logging system with start/stop buttons

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the template is fully customizable. You can modify hourly rates, add custom project fields, adjust the dashboard layout, and create additional views to match your workflow.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion account. All calculations and automation are built using Notion's standard formula and database features.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Very simple - just duplicate the template, set your hourly rates, and start tracking. The entire setup takes less than 5 minutes with no technical knowledge required.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: Yes, this template uses current Notion features and database structures that remain compatible with the latest Notion updates.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The template includes setup instructions and usage guidelines. Most users find it intuitive, but you can reference Notion's help documentation for database questions.
